tool_description: Translation of all subtitles and speech in the video into the target language
name: Video Translation
title: Video Translation

api_list.name: Open Account
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://video-translation.p.rapidapi.com/user/create"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "video-translation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Video Translation
api_list.description: Fully automatic monitoring of the sound in the video, automatic extraction and then translation to the target language.
